item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Netanyahu vows retaliation after Iran fires barrage of missiles at Israel
2. Vance and Walz clash over economy and Trump’s 2020 electoral defeat
3. [Opinion] Israel and Iran have just delivered the US election’s ‘October surprise’
4. Israel strikes Beirut after Iran missile attack stokes fears of wider war
5. Israel’s twin fears collide on a Jaffa street
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
